sentence.Network_en: Let us not cavil too much.
A carper will cavil at anything.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱挑剔的人对什么都挑剔.

sentence.Network_en: Even he could find nothing to cavil about.
sentence.Network_cn: 连他都挑不出什么毛病来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: C开头的单词记忆法（1） - 豆丁网 ... rn 牛了变成了大洞 【参】 cavil v. 挑剔，吹毛求疵＝ caviler n. 吹毛求疵者，苛责者 【类】.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... cavity n． （牙齿等的）洞、腔 cavil v． 挑毛病，吹毛求疵 cede v． 割让（土地，权利）.
希高翻译-石油化工词汇中英对照C二 ... cavey formation 坍塌岩层；有洞穴的岩层 cavil 找错；尖锤 caving ground 不稳定地层.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... cavity n． （牙齿等的）洞、腔 cavil v． 挑毛病，吹毛求疵 cede v． 割让（土地，权利）.

SAT填... ... 苛责，吹毛求疵的-- carp cavil pick criticize quibble 虚弱的，衰老的-- feckless flaccid flagging languid effete.
honey , brother cavil was my childhood priest ., 亲爱的 , 卡维尔是我小时候的牧师.
无可指摘的得到证实 be proven beyond cavil  秘书长,办事主任 chief clerk  割让领土 cede the territory  转让企业经营权 cede the right to work the.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French caviller, from Latin cavillari, from cavilla 'mockery'

entry.def: If you say that someone cavils at something, you mean that they make criticisms of it that you think are unimportant or unnecessary.

example.ex: Let us not cavil too much...
I don't think this is the time to cavil at the wording of the report.
example.tran: 我觉得现在还不是对报告的措辞较真的时候。

means.word_mean: 1. an evasion of the point of an argument by raising irrelevant distinctions or objections

auth_sentence.content: Wilt thou enjoy the good, Then cavil the conditions?
auth_sentence.res_content: Wilt thou enjoy the good, Then cavil the conditions?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wilt thou enjoy the good, Then cavil the conditions?

auth_sentence.content: If "Billboard" wants to proclaim it as one of ours, who are we to cavil?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: If "Billboard" wants to proclaim it as one of ours, who are we to cavil?
